## PHQ-9 vs SF-36

When it comes to comparing different psychology questionnaires, Harmony simplifies the task remarkably. Whether you're matching items from PHQ-9 vs SF-36 or any other pair of questionnaires, Harmony utilises advanced AI algorithms to harmonise the items, saving you the hassle of manual comparisons.
